channel.title: Blog on thingsithinkithink
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on thingsithinkithink

item.title: Does OpenAI's loss on ChatGPT Pro mean they're doomed?
item.description: A WhatsApp group that I’m part of has been discussing whether or not OpenAI is overvalued and in trouble as a result of this recent TechCrunch article.

item.title: Think Slow, Act Fast: The Paradox of Project Planning
item.description: In the book How Big Things Get Done, Bent Flyvbjerg and Dan Gardner presented an analysis of why large projects fail to meet their objectives. As someone who has witnessed the ups and downs of loads of projects, I’m very curious to learn what we can do better.

item.title: Two AI things from Kent Hendricks' annual 'Things I learned' blog
item.description:
Two AI things I learned reading Kent Hendricks’ annual “Things I learned” blog post:

  1. The introduction of ChatGPT led to a 2% decrease in freelance job postings on Upwork.

item.title: Off-the-Radar AI links for the End of the Year
item.description: Everyone has an exhaustive end of the year list. I don’t but there were a couple of things I got value from that I havne’t seen anyone else posting about.

item.title: Things I Think I Think
item.description:
I want to use this blog to think, learn, and work in public..

I chose this name because I want to be able to write stuff without having to definitely commit forever to holding whatever ideas I have shared. Therefore these posts are just things I think I think.
